original_text: I gave both pieces of paper to Baruch, the son of Neriah and grandson of Mahseiah. Hanamel watched me as I did this, as well as the men who had written their names on the paper. The people of Judah who were there in the guards' yard also watched me.
korean_text: 나의 숙부의 아들 하나멜과 매매 증서에 인 친 증인 앞과 시위대 뜰에 앉아 있는 유다 모든 사람 앞에서 그 매매 증서를 마세야의 손자 네리야의 아들 바룩에게 부치며

sentences.original_text: I gave both pieces of paper to Baruch
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 두 종이 조각을 바룩에게 주었다

sentences.original_text: Hanamel watched me as I did this
sentences.korean_translation: 하나멘이 내가 이것을 할 때 나를 지켜보았다

sentences.original_text: as well as the men who had written their names on the paper
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 종이에 자신들의 이름을 썼던 사람들도

sentences.original_text: The people of Judah who were there in the guards' yard
